# inset(_:)

**Type Method**

A dimension that’s the step size minus the specified inset value on each side.

## Declaration

```swift
static func inset(_ value: CGFloat) -> MarkDimensions<DataElement>
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The given inset value in screen coordinates.
title: inset(_:)
